oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Weed control in organic crop rotations for grain production
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Rasmussen, Ilse A.
Askegaard, Margrethe
Olesen, Jørgen E.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Weed management
Cereals, pulses and oilseeds
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Weed management carried out in organic crop rotation experiments for grain production. Preliminary results.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Rasmussen, Ilse A.; Askegaard, Margrethe and Olesen, Jørgen E. (1999) Weed control in organic crop rotations for grain production. In: Kropff, M.J.; Gut, D.; Streibig, J.C. and Baumann, D.T. (Eds.) Proceedings 11th EWRS Symposium, European Weed Research Society, p. 98.
